title: Boston Globe's Ben Volin breaks down Patriots trading Brandin Cooks to Rams
description:
The Patriots blew the lid off a sleepy offseason Tuesday when they decided to trade Brandin Cooks to the Rams after just a single season in New England. Ben Volin of the Boston Globe joins Will Brinson to break down what the deal means, including whether Cooks was ever really a fit with the Patriots, how this is good news for New England on the Rob Gronkowski front, whether the Patriots could get involved in the Odell Beckham sweepstakes, if the Pats will go after a quarterback in the draft now that they have two first-round picks, the Patriots offseason as a whole, how Cooks will fit in the Rams offense and if the Rams are the top NFC contender now. Bonus: Ben's got a sleeper pick for the Masters!
